highlightType.Name: Message highlight style
highlightType.Hint: How new messages should be temporarily highlighted.
highlightType.Title: Title only

borderColor.Name: Message border color (hex)
borderColor.Hint: Customizes the temporary border color of new chat messages.

titleColor.Name: Message title color (hex)
titleColor.Hint: Customizes the temporary title color of new chat messages.

highlightDuration.Name: Message highlight duration (s)
highlightDuration.Hint: The amount of time that new chat messages should be temporarily highlighted, in seconds.
